summary: Life in the suburbs as a father of two has worn down Jonas. When a victim of a car crash mistakes him for her boyfriend Sebastian, things take a very dramatic turn as the line between truth and deception is erased.
cast: Anders W. Berthelsen|Rebecka Hemse|Nikolaj Lie Kaas|Charlotte Fich|Dejan Cukic|Karsten Jansfort|Flemming Enevold|Bent Mejding|Ewa Fröling|Josephine Raahauge|Timm Vladimir|Ditte Hansen|Fanny Bornedal|Daniel Stampe|Jannie Faurschou|Karin Jagd|Niels Anders Thorn|Desmond Boateng|Rune Klan|Lin Kun Wu|Thomas Chaanhing|Antony Castle|Inger Lodberg|Rolf Rasmussen
keywords: scene of the crime|suburb|hospital|memory loss|male female relationship
title: Kærlighed på film
